name: frontend-design
description: Distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Avoids generic AI aesthetics. Use when: building UI components, creating landing pages, implementing responsive designs.

inputs.name: component
inputs.description: Component type: landing, dashboard, form, card, navigation

inputs.name: style
inputs.description: Style: minimal, bold, glassmorphism, brutalist, corporate
